    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AutoRepeatHandler
    Handles DAS/ARR style repeats for movement keys.
    BackgroundMusicManager
    Singleton helper that loops menu / gameplay music, exposes quick FX triggers, and gracefully handles missing assets.
    BackgroundMusicManager.Mode
     
    Board
    Abstraction over the playfield state that exposes the operations required by GameLogic.
    Brick
     
    BrickColorPalette
    Centralises the mapping between tile IDs and their display colours so multiple UI components can stay in sync.
    BrickColorPalette.PaletteProfile
     
    BrickGenerator
     
    BrickRotator
     
    ClearRow
     
    DownData
     
    EventSource
     
    EventType
     
    GameConfig
    Holds runtime configuration toggles (currently the deterministic seed option).
    GameConfig.GameMode
     
    GameController
    Wires GuiController input callbacks to GameLogic and keeps the board/score in sync.
    GameLogic
    Encapsulates gameplay mechanics (movement, lock delay, scoring) so the controller can remain focused on UI orchestration.
    GameOverPanel
    Overlay shown when the game reaches a GAME OVER state.
    GameSettings
    Immutable snapshot capturing the player's gameplay preferences (key bindings, DAS/ARR tuning, audio options).
    GameSettings.Action
    Logical key-bindable actions supported by the UI.
    GameSettings.Builder
    Mutable builder with validation steps on every setter to guarantee sane persisted values.
    GameSettings.ColorAssistMode
    Color palette presets exposed in the settings dialog.
    GameSettingsStore
    Persists GameSettings to a portable properties file (defaults to ~/.tetrisjfx/settings.properties).
    GameState
    Represents the high-level state of the Tetris game flow.
    GuiController
    JavaFX controller for the gameplay scene.
    HelpContentProvider
    Loads the Markdown help content and exposes parsed shortcuts for reuse.
    HelpDialogController
    Controller for the reusable help dialog.
    HelpDialogService
    Utility for displaying the help dialog from any controller.
    HighScoreEntry
    Immutable value object describing a single leaderboard row (score, mode, clear time, timestamp).
    HighScoreService
    Persists leaderboard records on the user's machine to survive new sessions.
    HudPanel
    Stylised HUD panel that mirrors the "run telemetry" card in the HTML reference.
    InputEventListener
     
    LevelProgression
    Tracks Tetris guideline level progression and provides the gravity interval associated with each level so GUI/control layers can remain agnostic.
    LevelProgression.LevelState
    Immutable view of the current level progression state.
    LineClearStats
    Immutable value object describing the outcome of a line clear.
    LineClearType
    Represents the classification of a line clear for scoring purposes.
    Main
    JavaFX entry point that loads the start menu and wires it to the primary stage.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility methods for copying, merging, and clearing board matrices.
    ModeSelectController
    Modal controller that lets the player pick a GameConfig.GameMode.
    MoveEvent
     
    NextQueuePanel
    Displays the Guideline-style NEXT queue (five previews) beside the board.
    NextShapeInfo
     
    NotificationPanel
    Disposable overlay used to show combo/bonus notifications above the playfield.
    PieceGenerator
    Implements the Guideline 7-bag randomiser.
    ResourceManager
    Central registry for application resources (FXML, fonts, markdown, audio).
    ResourceManager.Asset
    Known assets bundled inside src/main/resources and resolved relative to the classpath root.
    Score
    Tracks score, combo, and back-to-back counters using JavaFX properties for UI binding.
    SettingsController
    Controller for the settings dialog that tunes DAS/ARR/SDF and key bindings.
    SimpleBoard
    Default Board implementation that holds the matrix state, active tetromino, and helper objects (rotator/generator) needed for Guideline playfields.
    StartMenuController
    Controller for the start menu.
    TetrisLogoView
    Animated "Tetris FX" style logo with glitch overlays.
    TetrominoType
     
    ViewData
